article_title: Oregon Governor Releases Thousands More Kitzhaber Emails . News
article_text:
David Nogueras

Kitzhaber resigned from the governor’s office in February amid allegations he and Hayes used their positions in government for personal gain.

og.description: Oregon Gov. Kate Brown released more than 17,000 pages of emails Tuesday from two email accounts former Gov. John Kitzhaber used for state business.
og.title: Oregon Governor Releases Thousands More Kitzhaber Emails
